story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2025, Hotleno emerged from a simple yet powerful idea: travel should be effortless, transparent, and accessible to everyone. Our platform was born out of frustration with complex booking systems and hidden fees that plague the travel industry.
story.paragraph2: Today, we're proud to be a UK-registered company (Company Number 16587327) specializing in travel services, reservations, and visibility. We connect travelers with the perfect accommodations at competitive prices, while maintaining the highest standards of service and integrity.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Hotleno

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: No hidden fees, no surprises. We believe in clear pricing and honest communication at every step of your booking journey.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We've built our reputation on reliability and integrity. Your security and satisfaction are our top priorities.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously evolving our platform to deliver cutting-edge features that simplify travel planning and enhance your experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At Hotleno, we're on a mission to transform the way people discover and book travel accommodations. We believe that finding the perfect place to stay should be simple, transparent, and enjoyable.
mission.paragraph2: By leveraging cutting-edge technology and maintaining the highest standards of integrity, we provide travelers with unparalleled access to diverse accommodations at competitive prices. Our platform empowers users with comprehensive visibility into their options, ensuring they make informed decisions with confidence.
mission.ctaDescription: We're constantly pushing boundaries to create seamless booking experiences that anticipate travelers' needs and exceed their expectations.

terms.heroDescription: Please read these terms carefully before using our services
terms.noticeDescription: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions
terms.overviewText1: Welcome to Hotleno! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website, mobile applications, and related services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.overviewText2: These terms affect your legal rights and obligations. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use our services.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of Hotleno's websites, mobile applications, and services ('Services'). Please read these Terms carefully before using the Services.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
definitions.content:
In these Terms:

  • 'Hotleno', 'we', 'us', or 'our' refers to Hotleno LTD
  • 'User', 'you', or 'your' refers to any person accessing or using our Services
  • 'Content' means text, images, videos, reviews, and other materials

accountRegistration.title: 3. Account Registration
accountRegistration.content:
To access certain features, you may need to register an account. You must provide accurate information and keep your account secure.

You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

bookings.title: 4. Bookings & Payments
bookings.content:
All bookings are subject to availability. Prices are displayed in the local currency but may be converted during payment processing.

We accept various payment methods as displayed during checkout. Your payment is processed securely.

cancellations.title: 5. Cancellations & Refunds
cancellations.content:
Cancellation policies vary by property. Please review the specific cancellation policy for your booking.

Refunds, if applicable, will be processed within 14 business days to the original payment method.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All content on our platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Hotleno or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.

You may not use our content without express written permission.

liability.title: 7. Liability
liability.content:
Hotleno acts as an intermediary between users and accommodation providers. We are not responsible for any issues arising during your stay.

Our liability is limited to the total cost of your booking.

privacy.title: 8. Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect and use your personal information.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content:
We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through our platform or via email.

Continued use of our Services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of London, UK.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our mobile app

1.question: Is the app available for both iOS and Android?
1.answer: Yes! Our app is available for both iOS and Android devices. Download from App Store or Google Play.

2.question: Do I need to create a new account for the app?
2.answer: No, you can use your existing website account to log into the app. All saved preferences and booking history will sync automatically.

3.question: Are mobile bookings more expensive?
3.answer: Actually, we offer mobile-exclusive deals that are often cheaper than our website prices. Plus, you'll get app-only promotional offers.

4.question: Can I manage existing bookings through the app?
4.answer: Absolutely! You can view, modify, or cancel any booking made through our platform directly in the app.
